8421d3ed-2c64-4222-9284-1f2ef10d1434.__data__:
{"id_":"8421d3ed-2c64-4222-9284-1f2ef10d1434","metadata":{"url":"https://www.shipmercury.com/shipment-types/clinical-trials/direct-to-patient"},"excludedEmbedMetadataKeys":[],"excludedLlmMetadataKeys":[],"relationships":{},"text":"CONTACT AN EXPERT
Home
Shipment Types
Clinical Trials
Direct-to-Patient services
Direct-To/From-Patient Services
Mercury streamlines clinical trial logistics for researchers with our patient-centric approach. Our specialized Direct-to-Patient (DtP) and Direct-from-Patient (DfP) services ensure swift, secure delivery and pick-up, easing the recruitment and retention process. Simplify your trials with Mercury – logistics solutions for researchers focused on efficiency.
Streamlining Clinical Trials
We understand how crucial Direct-to-Patient logistics (DtP) is for sticking to treatment schedules. Minimizing the need for patient travel makes it easier for researchers to find and keep qualified participants and helps manufacturers reach a broader patient base. Our experience navigating local regulations and restrictions ensures a smooth shift to a DtP model for your trials.
Peace-of-Mind Sample Collection
Our DfP services specialize in managing the journey back, simplifying the process of biological specimen pick-up. Our expertise lies in swift and reliable home collection, ensuring timely delivery of samples to the lab, with a dedicated emphasis on preserving the integrity of each sample during transit—particularly crucial for sensitive biological samples and temperature-sensitive specimens. Leveraging comprehensive tracking systems, we keep you informed every step of the way, guaranteeing a secure and seamless cold chain solution for your most delicate samples.
Benefits of Direct-To/From-Patient Logistics:
Patient-Centric Engagement: Direct delivery and pick-up boost patient engagement and retention, especially for those facing participation barriers.
Accessibility: Break geographical barriers by delivering clinical trial products directly to patients, regardless of location.
Efficient Sample Collection: Minimize patient-to-lab wait times with secure, timely pickup of sensitive samples from patients' homes.
Privacy Assurance: Minimize clinic visits, prioritizing patient privacy and confidentiality throughout the trial.
Operational Optimization: Leverage our network partners, GPS tracking, and integrated systems for end-to-end logistics efficiency.
Adaptability: Stay compliant with evolving regulations globally, ensuring a future-proof solution for clinical trials.
Partnering With Mercury
Choosing Mercury as your logistics partner means having a dedicated team committed to managing and ensuring the security of your shipments. Our experts navigate the intricacies of healthcare logistics with professionalism and expediency. Our approach is straightforward – we prioritize compliance, uphold quality standards, and ensure product safety.
Reach out to us to learn how our Direct-to-Patient and Direct-from-Patient services seamlessly integrate with your requirements, enhancing accessibility to healthcare and optimizing your logistics with efficiency.
Related Links

Biological Specimen Shipping
Diagnostic Testing Kit Shipping
CAR-T Shipping Services

ISO 9001:2015 Certified
Our Quality Management System (QMS) is designed to meet the rigorous ISO 9001:2015 standard, which ensures that our business processes are carefully monitored, measured, and controlled to promote continual improvement.
Upcoming Webinar

March 7, 2024 | 2PM
Learn about clinical shipping and Research Use Only classification. Common issues in life sciences shipping and best practices to overcome them. Expert guidance on pre-clearance and clearance for seamless shipments across borders.

92850dc2-a848-4605-b30f-9f082a73c422.__data__:
{"id_":"92850dc2-a848-4605-b30f-9f082a73c422","metadata":{"url":"https://www.shipmercury.com/shipment-types/clinical-trials/direct-to-patient"},"excludedEmbedMetadataKeys":[],"excludedLlmMetadataKeys":[],"relationships":{"SOURCE":{"nodeId":"8421d3ed-2c64-4222-9284-1f2ef10d1434","metadata":{"url":"https://www.shipmercury.com/shipment-types/clinical-trials/direct-to-patient"},"hash":"w7JqFZCfDV7fOq08jHOwn7AryufTq5StTxyjXygRRg8="}},"text":"CONTACT AN EXPERT
Home
Shipment Types
Clinical Trials
Direct-to-Patient services
Direct-To/From-Patient Services
Mercury streamlines clinical trial logistics for researchers with our patient-centric approach. Our specialized Direct-to-Patient (DtP) and Direct-from-Patient (DfP) services ensure swift, secure delivery and pick-up, easing the recruitment and retention process. Simplify your trials with Mercury – logistics solutions for researchers focused on efficiency.
Streamlining Clinical Trials
We understand how crucial Direct-to-Patient logistics (DtP) is for sticking to treatment schedules. Minimizing the need for patient travel makes it easier for researchers to find and keep qualified participants and helps manufacturers reach a broader patient base. Our experience navigating local regulations and restrictions ensures a smooth shift to a DtP model for your trials.
Peace-of-Mind Sample Collection
Our DfP services specialize in managing the journey back, simplifying the process of biological specimen pick-up. Our expertise lies in swift and reliable home collection, ensuring timely delivery of samples to the lab, with a dedicated emphasis on preserving the integrity of each sample during transit—particularly crucial for sensitive biological samples and temperature-sensitive specimens. Leveraging comprehensive tracking systems, we keep you informed every step of the way, guaranteeing a secure and seamless cold chain solution for your most delicate samples.
Benefits of Direct-To/From-Patient Logistics:
Patient-Centric Engagement: Direct delivery and pick-up boost patient engagement and retention, especially for those facing participation barriers.
Accessibility: Break geographical barriers by delivering clinical trial products directly to patients, regardless of location.
Efficient Sample Collection: Minimize patient-to-lab wait times with secure, timely pickup of sensitive samples from patients' homes.
Privacy Assurance: Minimize clinic visits, prioritizing patient privacy and confidentiality throughout the trial.
Operational Optimization: Leverage our network partners, GPS tracking, and integrated systems for end-to-end logistics efficiency.
Adaptability: Stay compliant with evolving regulations globally, ensuring a future-proof solution for clinical trials.
Partnering With Mercury
Choosing Mercury as your logistics partner means having a dedicated team committed to managing and ensuring the security of your shipments. Our experts navigate the intricacies of healthcare logistics with professionalism and expediency. Our approach is straightforward – we prioritize compliance, uphold quality standards, and ensure product safety.
Reach out to us to learn how our Direct-to-Patient and Direct-from-Patient services seamlessly integrate with your requirements, enhancing accessibility to healthcare and optimizing your logistics with efficiency.
Related Links
Clinical Trials Logistics
Pre-Clinical Trials Shipping
Biological Specimen Shipping
Diagnostic Testing Kit Shipping
CAR-T Shipping Services

ISO 9001:2015 Certified
Our Quality Management System (QMS) is designed to meet the rigorous ISO 9001:2015 standard, which ensures that our business processes are carefully monitored, measured, and controlled to promote continual improvement.
Upcoming Webinar
International and Domestic Shipping for Life Sciences
March 7, 2024 | 2PM
Learn about clinical shipping and Research Use Only classification. Common issues in life sciences shipping and best practices to overcome them. Expert guidance on pre-clearance and clearance for seamless shipments across borders.
